Package DynaBlast

Class Level

  • java.lang.Object
    • DynaBlast.Level
  • public class Level
extends java.lang.Object
    Class loads level from file to two dimensions char table and from this table loads level to two dimensions Block table. Contains render method.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      Block[][] block
      two dimensions table of @Block containing all level blocks
      char[][] blockList
      two dimensions table of chars containing coded data about level plan receive data from external file by @loadLevelFromFile method
      java.io.File fileLocation1
      information about path to .txt file with level data
      static int margin
      margin from left and top of the window
      java.util.Scanner sc
      scanner to read chars from .txt file
